recipeInstructions.text: Pour the water into a mixing bowl and whisk yeast into it until dissolved. Then add the baking powder vinegar and salt.

Cover the bowl and leave for about 1 hour in your oven at 30Â°C. The mixture will begin to rise and form bubbles on the surface. Do not disturb the mixture as you want to keep all the aeration that has formed.
Butter or spray with cooking oil the inside of four muffin rings and place them in a frypan (make sure you also spray the bottom of the pan with cooking oil).

Set your stove top to low heat and with a large spoon, proceed to fill the rings three quarters of the way up. Allow crumpets to cook for 10 minutes or so and until you see that the tops nave set. Then turn over and let the crumpet cook until slightly golden.
